mean_cn: n. 徽章；象征；标记；  vt. 给予…标记；授予…徽章
mean_en: a small object (such as a tag, pin, or metal shield) that is worn or held up by a person so that it can be easily seen, that has writing (such as a person's name) and often a picture on it, and that shows a person's occupation, rank, membership of a socie
sentence: He showed me his badge to prove he was a cop.
sentence_trans: 他向我展示他的警徽来证明他是警察。
